name: Gene Harvesting (Ludum Dare 52)
description:
Harvest crops and insects. Create all kinds of weird items by combining different items through genetic modification. And unlock all achievements.

Instructions:

Crops can be harvested by pulling them up and holding them in that position.

Unlock new harvestable items by either purchasing from the shop or merging items.

To purchase from the shop, click on a shop item and select items from the inventory to trade.

To combine items, put the desired items into the slots beneath the center of the screen, then click around the two slots to execute genetic modification.

Hover and click on the bottom of the screen to bring up the achievements window.

Controls:

Tab: Open / Close Achievements Window

Shift + Left Click: Move an item to the left crafting slot

Shift + Right Click: Move an item to the right crafting slot

Hints:

Five harvestable crops, three of which are obtainable from the shop, the other two obtainable by combining two other crops.

Four harvestable insects, three of which are obtainable from the shop, the remaining one obtainable by combining two other insects.

Three tools, one obtainable from the shop, one obtainable by combining a specific tool and insect, and one obtainable by combining two items that are similar to each other.

Five of the remaining items are obtainable by combining crops and insects.

And the last two items are obtained randomly when harvesting crops.

Cheats:

Key 1: Spawn random unlocked items

Key 2: Spawn random items
